      设置盘点回调接口，接收循环盘点到的标签数据
      Set the inventory callback interface to receive the label data from the cyclic inventory
      备注：需要在开始循环盘点RFIDWithUHFUART.startInventoryTag()之前调用此方法。
      Note: This method needs to be called before starting the loop inventory RFIDWithUHFUART.startInventoryTag().
